item.title: Change Firefox's zoom by script
item.description: Each time I change the monitor I have to zoom in or out firefox. Here’s how to set it via script: Figure 1: Large Figure 2: Small Locate the appropriate file ls /home/*/.mozilla/firefox/*/prefs.js Locate the appropriate parameter grep layout.css.devPixelsPerPx /home/*/.mozilla/firefox/*/prefs.js Large screen: Set the zoom #!/usr/bin/env bash if grep 'layout.css.devPixelsPerPx' /home/*/.mozilla/firefox/*/prefs.js then sed -i -e 's/^user_pref("layout.css.devPixelsPerPx.*$/user_pref("layout.css.devPixelsPerPx", "2.0");/' /home/*/.mozilla/firefox/*/prefs.js else echo 'user_pref("layout.css.devPixelsPerPx", "2.0");' >> /home/*/.
